text: Ana Paula Polegatch (born 21 October 1988) is a Brazilian road cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Women's Continental Team . She became national time trial champion in 2014. ==Major results== ;2012 : National Road Championships ::3rd Time trial ::4th Road race ;2014 :1st 20px Time trial, National Road Championships ;2015 :2nd Time trial, Military World Games :3rd Overall Tour Femenino de San Luis :4th Time trial, Pan American Road Championships ;2016 :1st Overall Torneio de Veräo :1st 1º de Maio em Indaiatuba :National Road Championships ::2nd Road race ::2nd Time trial ;2017 :1st 20px Madison, National Track Championships : National Road Championships ::1st 20px Time trial ::2nd Road race :2nd Gran Cup de Ciclismo :2nd 1º de Maio em Indaiatuba ;2018 :2nd Overall Tour Internacional Femenino de Uruguay ::1st Stages 2 (ITT) & 4 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1988 births Category:People from Guarapuava Category:Brazilian female cyclists Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Cyclists at the 2015 Pan American Games
title: Ana Paula Polegatch
